channel.title: Raining cats and dogs
channel.description:
Its raining pretty dang hard in so cal... and even better its a lightning storm, WITH WIND!!!
Thats probably one of my most favorite weather scenarios
And i get orgasumz from thunder and lightning :cool:
Discuss your favorite weather scenarios/temp etc.

item.title: Raining cats and dogs
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

naked outside at -40 while it snowing

you will never complain about it being so cold anymore
